lenders.name: W. Luis Soto
lenders.occupation: Student | Private Consultant in Child Development
lenders.loan_because:
I know what it feels like to be in need and not have enough.  I also understand that the economy needs to be stimulated in America, as well as outside of America, to maintain a healthy free market.  So even if I can spend my money I use for "fun" on others who need money to live a better life I will do so.  I mean, I think I can survive without some of that junk food I enjoy so much :) if it means putting food into the mouths of others!

Also, check out my description about my work:  I have some other reasons why I want to lend in that section too.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a foster child which means that I lived with a family other than my own so that they could take care of me.  Also, my state assisted the families to take care of me.  Not that my parents do not love me, but they could not have provided my basic needs (like, enough food or other basic needs) when I was younger.

Anyways, I am a student at the local university and work from home to help other foster children by voicing my views on better laws and making better policies that concern children and families.  Which is my main reason for lending to you and others in need through Kiva.

Use KivaLens for Live Filtering (immediately see the impact of your selections), search by a combination of last payment date, group size, currency exchange protection, partner rating/delinq/profitability/portfolio-yield, exclude pilots, exclude religious/secular and use keywords for sector/activity/partner/country/use/description.  

View the long descriptions in 30 languages and analyze your portfolio and display pie charts of how diversified you are across country, sector, currency loss protection, non-payment liability, auto-balance your portfolio across countries/sectors/activities and create email alerts and RSS feeds for your favorite types of searches. Enjoy!

lenders.name: Charlye
lenders.loan_because: I believe in people and our collective ability to create a world we can all be inspired by and flourish within.  As a means of contributing to this I seek ways to leverage my impact through supporting social enterprises and working with like-minded people.
lenders.occupational_info:
I see my passion for dance and the arts as a vehicle to reaching and supporting others with the  potential to have a greater impact on the world.  I also see it as a means of connecting our work to people and communities that would benefit from it. 
 
I would like to see my business become a place for all kinds of people to find fulfillment in their passion and be inspired to have a greater impact on the world.  I would also like have the business itself become an incredible source of social wealth for the world through innovative programs, strategic investments and an unwavering demand for collective progress!

lenders.name: Denise
lenders.loan_because: I love Jesus, and I want to do His work. Sewing is such a wonderful blessing for me, and I would love to help someone out that's trying to make their life better thru stitching!
lenders.occupational_info: I sell sewing machines and teach people how to use their sewing machines to enhance or better their lives.

lenders.loan_because: I want to contribute effectively. MFI is a way of helping people reach a higher level of affluence that will have permanent results.
